Please see the license in the file LICENSE and URL above * 00016 // * for the full disclaimer and the limitation of liability. * 00017 // * * 00018 // * This code implementation is the result of the scientific and * 00019 // * technical work of the GEANT4 collaboration. * 00020 // * By using, copying, modifying or distributing the software (or * 00021 // * any work based on the software) you agree to acknowledge its * 00022 // * use in resulting scientific publications, and indicate your * 00023 // * acceptance of all terms of the Geant4 Software license. * 00024 // ******************************************************************** 00025 // 00026 // 00029 00030 #include "B1DetectorConstruction.hh" 00031 00032 #include "G4RunManager.hh" 00033 #include "G4NistManager.hh" 00034 #include "G4Box.hh" 00035 #include "G4Cons.hh" 00036 #include "G4Orb.hh" 00037 #include "G4Sphere.hh" 00038 #include "G4Trd.hh" 00039 #include "G4LogicalVolume.hh" 00040 #include "G4PVPlacement.hh" 00041 #include "G4SystemOfUnits.hh" 00042 #include "TMXElements.hh" 00043 00044 00045 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo...... 00046 00047 B1DetectorConstruction::B1DetectorConstruction() 00048 : G4VUserDetectorConstruction() 00049 { } 00050 00051 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo...... 00052 00053 B1DetectorConstruction::~B1DetectorConstruction() 00054 { } 00055 00056 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo...... 00057 00058 G4VPhysicalVolume* B1DetectorConstruction::Construct() 00059 { 00060 /* 1 sphere 100 % U5 00061 * 2 sphere 50% U5/U8 00062 * 3 GODIVA 00063 * 5 SPHERE WATER 00064 * 6 water 00065 */ 00066 G4int a = 3; 00067 00068 // Option to switch on/off checking of volumes overlaps 00069 // 00070 G4bool checkOverlaps = true; 00071 00072 // 00073 // World 00074 // 00075 00076 00077 00078 00079 00080 00081 00082 00083 00084 00085 if(a <3){ 00086 00087 00088 G4Material* world_mat = new G4Material("world_air_mat", 0.001293*(g/cm3), 2, kStateGas, 293.6 * kelvin); 00089 world_mat->AddElement(DefineElement(70140, "N14"),0.75); 00090 world_mat->AddElement(DefineElement(80160, "O16"),0.25); 00091 00092 //G4Material* world_mat = nist->FindOrBuildMaterial("G4_AIR"); 00093 00094 G4Box* solidWorld = 00095 new G4Box("World", //its name 00096 25 * cm, 25 * cm, 25 * cm); //its size 00097 00098 G4LogicalVolume* logicWorld = 00099 new G4LogicalVolume(solidWorld, //its solid 00100 world_mat, //its material 00101 "World"); //its name 00102 00103 G4VPhysicalVolume* physWorld = 00104 new G4PVPlacement(0, //no rotation 00105 G4ThreeVector(), //at (0,0,0) 00106 logicWorld, //its logical volume 00107 "World", //its name 00108 0, //its mother volume 00109 false, //no boolean operation 00110 0, //copy number 00111 checkOverlaps); //overlaps checking 00112 00113 G4Material* matU235; 00114 if (a == 1){ 00115 00116 matU235 = new G4Material("matU235", 19.1 *(g/cm3), 1, kStateSolid, 293.6 * kelvin); 00117 matU235->AddElement(DefineElement(922350, "U5"), 1); 00118 } 00119 if (a == 2){ 00120 00121 matU235 = new G4Material("matU235", 19.1 *(g/cm3), 2, kStateSolid, 293.6 * kelvin); 00122 matU235->AddElement(DefineElement(922350, "U5"), 0.5); 00123 matU235->AddElement(DefineElement(922380, "U8"), 0.5); 00124 } 00125 // 00126 // Envelope 00127 // 00128 G4Box* solidEnv = 00129 new G4Box("Envelope", //its name 00130 25 * cm, 25 * cm, 25 * cm); //its size 00131 00132 G4LogicalVolume* logicEnv = 00133 new G4LogicalVolume(solidEnv, //its solid 00134 world_mat, //its material 00135 "Envelope"); //its name 00136 00137 new G4PVPlacement(0, //no rotation 00138 G4ThreeVector(), //at (0,0,0) 00139 logicEnv, //its logical volume 00140 "Envelope", //its name 00141 logicWorld, //its mother volume 00142 false, //no boolean operation 00143 0, //copy number 00144 checkOverlaps); //overlaps checking 00145 00146 // 00147 // Shape 2 00148 // 00149 00150 00151 G4ThreeVector pos2 = G4ThreeVector(0, 0, 0); 00152 00153 // Cube shape 00154 00155 G4Orb* solidShape2 = 00156 new G4Orb("Shape2", //its name 00157 8.549667 * cm); //its size 00158 00159 G4LogicalVolume* logicShape2 = 00160 new G4LogicalVolume(solidShape2, //its solid 00161 matU235, //its material 00162 "Shape2"); //its name 00163 00164 new G4PVPlacement(0, //no rotation 00165 pos2, //at position 00166 logicShape2, //its logical volume 00167 "Shape2", //its name 00168 logicEnv, //its mother volume 00169 false, //no boolean operation 00170 0, //copy number 00171 checkOverlaps); //overlaps checking 00172 00173 00174 00175 // 00176 //always return the physical World 00177 // 00178 00179 return physWorld; 00180 } 00181 00182 if(a==3) 00183 { 00184 00185 G4Material* matU235; 00186 00187 matU235 = new G4Material("matU235", 18.74 *(g/cm3), 2, kStateSolid, 293.6 * kelvin); 00188 matU235->AddElement(DefineElement(922350, "U5"), 0.9473); 00189 matU235->AddElement(DefineElement(922380, "U8"), 0.0527); 00190 00191 G4Orb* solidWorld = 00192 new G4Orb("Shape2", //its name 00193 8.735 * cm); //its size 00194 00195 G4LogicalVolume* logicWorld = 00196 new G4LogicalVolume(solidWorld, //its solid 00197 matU235, //its material 00198 "World"); //its name 00199 00200 G4VPhysicalVolume* physWorld = 00201 new G4PVPlacement(0, //no rotation 00202 G4ThreeVector(), //at (0,0,0) 00203 logicWorld, //its logical volume 00204 "World", //its name 00205 0, //its mother volume 00206 false, //no boolean operation 00207 0, //copy number 00208 checkOverlaps); //overlaps checking 00209 return physWorld; 00210 } 00211 00212 if (a == 5){ 00213 00214 00215 00216 G4Material *matU235 = new G4Material("matU235", 19.1 *(g/cm3), 1, kStateSolid, 293.6 * kelvin); 00217 matU235->AddElement(DefineElement(922350, "U5"), 1); 00218 00219 G4Orb* solidWorld = 00220 new G4Orb("Shape2", //its name 00221 21 * cm); //its size 00222 00223 G4LogicalVolume* logicWorld = 00224 new G4LogicalVolume(solidWorld, //its solid 00225 matU235, //its material 00226 "World"); //its name 00227 00228 G4VPhysicalVolume* physWorld = 00229 new G4PVPlacement(0, //no rotation 00230 G4ThreeVector(), //at (0,0,0) 00231 logicWorld, //its logical volume 00232 "World", //its name 00233 0, //its mother volume 00234 false, //no boolean operation 00235 0, //copy number 00236 checkOverlaps); //overlaps checking 00237 00238 00239 G4Material* world_h2o = new G4Material("world_h2o", 1*(g/cm3) , 3, kStateLiquid, 293.6 * kelvin); // T = 293 K 00240 world_h2o->AddElement(DefineElement(10010, "H"),19997); 00241 world_h2o->AddElement(DefineElement(10020, "D"),3); 00242 world_h2o->AddElement(DefineElement(80160, "O16"),10000); 00243 00244 G4Orb* waterWorld = 00245 new G4Orb("waterWorld", //its name 00246 18 * cm); //its size 00247 00248 G4LogicalVolume* logicWaterWorld = 00249 new G4LogicalVolume(waterWorld, //its solid 00250 world_h2o, //its material 00251 "water"); //its name 00252 00253 new G4PVPlacement(0, //no rotation 00254 G4ThreeVector(), //at (0,0,0) 00255 logicWaterWorld, //its logical volume 00256 "watW", //its name 00257 logicWorld, //its mother volume 00258 false, //no boolean operation 00259 0, //copy number 00260 checkOverlaps); //overlaps checking 00261 00262 return physWorld; 00263 } 00264 00265 if (a == 6){ 00266 00267 G4Material *matU235 = new G4Material("matU235", 19.1 *(g/cm3), 1, kStateSolid, 293.6 * kelvin); 00268 matU235->AddElement(DefineElement(922350, "U5"), 1); 00269 00270 00271 G4Material* world_h2o = new G4Material("world_h2o", 1*(g/cm3) , 3, kStateLiquid, 293.6 * kelvin); // T = 293 K 00272 world_h2o->AddElement(DefineElement(10010, "H"),19997); 00273 world_h2o->AddElement(DefineElement(10020, "D"),3); 00274 world_h2o->AddElement(DefineElement(80160, "O16"),10000); 00275 00276 G4Orb* solidWorld = 00277 new G4Orb("Shape2", //its name 00278 21 * cm); //its size 00279 00280 G4LogicalVolume* logicWorld = 00281 new G4LogicalVolume(solidWorld, //its solid 00282 world_h2o, //its material 00283 "World"); //its name 00284 00285 G4VPhysicalVolume* physWorld = 00286 new G4PVPlacement(0, //no rotation 00287 G4ThreeVector(), //at (0,0,0) 00288 logicWorld, //its logical volume 00289 "World", //its name 00290 0, //its mother volume 00291 false, //no boolean operation 00292 0, //copy number 00293 checkOverlaps); //overlaps checking 00294 00295 00296 00297 00298 G4Orb* waterWorld = 00299 new G4Orb("waterWorld", //its name 00300 1 * cm); //its size 00301 00302 G4LogicalVolume* logicWaterWorld = 00303 new G4LogicalVolume(waterWorld, //its solid 00304 matU235, //its material 00305 "water"); //its name 00306 00307 new G4PVPlacement(0, //no rotation 00308 G4ThreeVector(), //at (0,0,0) 00309 logicWaterWorld, //its logical volume 00310 "watW", //its name 00311 logicWorld, //its mother volume 00312 false, //no boolean operation 00313 0, //copy number 00314 checkOverlaps); //overlaps checking 00315 00316 return physWorld; 00317 } 00318 00319 } 00320 00321 00322 00323 00324 G4Element* B1DetectorConstruction::DefineElement(int IZA, std::string name) { 00325 00326 if( ! TMXElementStore::Store().size() ) {TMXElementStore::BuildElementDB();} // Build the database 00327 00328 const TMXElement* TMXElem = TMXElementStore::GetElement(IZA); 00329 00330 if(TMXElem) { 00331 std::string g4IsotSymb = TMXElem->Sym() + "-" + std::to_string(TMXElem->A())+ "-" + std::to_string(TMXElem->ISO()); 00332 std::string g4ElemSymb = g4IsotSymb; 00333 std::string g4ElemName = TMXElem->Name(); 00334 if( name != "" ) { g4ElemName = name; } 00335 00336 G4Element* g4Elem = G4Element::GetElement(g4ElemName, false); 00337 G4Isotope* g4Isot = nullptr; 00338 if( ! g4Elem && TMXElem->Z() < 101 ) { // if nullptr 00339 g4Elem = new G4Element(g4ElemName, g4ElemSymb, 1); 00340 g4Isot = G4Isotope::GetIsotope (g4IsotSymb, false); 00341 if( ! g4Isot) { 00342 // std::cout << "nous " << (TMXElem->Mweight()*g/mole) << std::endl; 00343 // std::cout << "eux " << ((G4NistManager::Instance()->GetAtomicMass(TMXElem->Z(),TMXElem->A()))*g/(mole*amu_c2)) << std::endl; 00344 00345 g4Isot = new G4Isotope(g4IsotSymb, TMXElem->Z(), TMXElem->A(), TMXElem->Mweight()*(g/mole), TMXElem->ISO());} 00346 00347 g4Elem->AddIsotope(g4Isot, 1.); 00348 } 00349 00350 return g4Elem; 00351 } 00352 return nullptr; 00353 } 00354 00355 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo......
